rComments: I LOVED this class. Prof Gautier is so incredible. She makes herself very understood, even in a foreign language! She's very helpful, and I looked forward to going to her class everyday. I think that if I had had anyone else for French1, I wouldn't have continued onto French2
She is very nice and helpful. she always make the class full of laugh. highly recommend for people who have no prior french experience to take her class.
Wonderful teacher, willing to help and clarify. Approachable and enthusiastic. Uses the book for lots of paired off and group oral exercises as most french classes do,

Christiane is probably the best teacher in the department. Not as demanding as some, but you still learn a great deal. Tests are fairly easy if you study, but the homework is worth a good amount and is where you loose the most points. The professor is a French native, so it makes the experience that much better. Amazing course!

Christiane is the best professor I have ever had. Not only is she hilarious, but she is also so interested in helping students. She seemed intimidating at first, but by the second class, the intimidation was gone. Homeworks/tests are not hard if you study. She is absolutely wonderful, though. Take French, just so you can have her as a teacher.

I had no previous experience with phonetics but this class was amazing! I have been speaking french for six years and I learned completely new information about pronunciation. I highly recommend this class to French enthusiasts. Madame Gautier was an amazing and patient teacher who's truly dedicated to her students. My favorite teacher at ucsc yet!
She's the best French teacher I've had yet. Through conversations, reading & analyzing plays, new & useful vocab & conversing she taught be how to be a better french speaker.

She is the best language teacher I've had yet. She knows what students need & is extremely helpful. You have to work in her class and show her you know what you're doing & that you're improving. Through reading plays, writing essays & conversing, I learned how to be a better french speaker. She's super nice and easy to understand.

She's such an intelligent woman and really made me want to learn French. A lot of beginning teachers take it for granted that one could quit at any time, but Christiane was passionate about showing her students how languages are fun and important. She's a great teacher, too. She speaks French nearly 100% of the class and I still understood.
She is ideal for a new French speaker.  She is extremely helpful, patient, and encouraging, as well as entertaining.  I highly recommend her.
She was very cute and french. If you do the hw, then the quizzes and tests are pretty easy. She likes to get everyone in the class to say something in french at least once each period.
She was very cute and french. If you do the hw, then the quizzes and tests are pretty easy. She likes to get everyone in the class to say something in french at least once each period.

I loved this class and prof.  If you do the daily homework and go to class, it's no problem.  She is good at speaking only French and still getting her students to understand.  I had a brutal class before this one and French always cheered me up.
